Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class TechniciansController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.TechniciansController
@Controller public class TechniciansController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with technicians.
Since:
2/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showTechList

      @RequestMapping("/technicians") public String showTechList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the technicians to the "technicians" model and redirects user to the technicians page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "technicians"

    • showContactList

      @GetMapping("/add-technician") public String showContactList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Technicians technician, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-technician page
      Adds contacts to the model
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      technician - Information on the technician being added
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-technician"

    • addtechnician

      @RequestMapping("/addtechnician") public String addtechnician(@Validated Technicians technician, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a technician to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the technician is saved in the techniciansRepository. and the user is redirect to /technicians
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-technician page.
      Parameters:
      technician - Information on the technician being added
      result - Ensures information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/technicians" or "/add/add-technician"

    • deletetechnician

      @GetMapping("/deletetechnician/{id}") public String deletetechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page If there are dependency issues, the technician is not deleted and an error is displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/technicians"

    • deleteTechnicianConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletetechnicianconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteTechnicianConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, deletes the technician and redirects to technicians page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/technicians"

    • viewTechnician

      @GetMapping("/viewtechnician/{id}") public String viewTechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that technician to the technicians page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician being viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "technicians"

    • viewMaintenanceOrders

      @GetMapping("/viewmaintenanceorders/{id}") public String viewMaintenanceOrders(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets all of the maintenance orders associated with the technician and adds those to the maintenance order page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician used to get the maintenance orders
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "maintenanceorders"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/edittechnician/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that technician to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the contacts, and technicians to the form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician being edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-technician"

    • updateTechnician

      @PostMapping("/updatetechnician/{id}") public String updateTechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Technicians technician, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a technician to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the technician is updated in the techniciansRepository. and the user is redirect to /technicians
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-technician page.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the technician being updated
      technician - Stores information on the technician being updated
      result - Ensure the information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/technicians" or "/update/update-technician"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
